Plot: Having escaped from Hong Kong, the five gatekeepers - Matt, Pedro, Scott, Jamie and Scarlett - are scattered in a hostile and dangerous world. As they struggle to re-group and plan their next move, the malevolent King of the Old Ones gathers his forces in Oblivion: a desolate landscape where the last survivors of humanity must fight the ultimate battle.
Setting: Cairo (Egypt), England, New York State (United States), Naples (Italy) Dubai (United Arab Emirates) Brazil Rome (Italy) Oblivion (Antarctica), Naples (Italy), Dubai (United Arab Emirates), Brazil, Rome (Italy), Oblivion (Antarctica)
